莃字的基本解释

莃
xī
菟葵，嫩叶茎可食，干后可入药。亦称“野葵”。

莃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xī］
［《廣韻》香衣切，平微，曉。］
草名。即菟葵。

莃字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　莃； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1033第05
【唐韻】香衣切，音希。【爾雅·釋草】莃，兔葵。【玉篇】似葵而葉小，壯如藜，有毛。汋啖之滑香。

莃字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
莃字的起名意思

暂无。

Gnocchi
Basic explanation of words
Gnocchi
xī
Winter aconite, young leaves and stems are edible, and can be used as medicine when dried. Also known as "wild sunflower".
Gnocchi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xī］
["Guangyun" Fragrant clothes cut, flat and small, Xiao. ]
Cursive name. That is Dodder Kwai.
Gnocchi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　莃; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1033 No. 05
[Tang Yun] Fragrant clothes cut, Yinxi. 【Erya·Shucao】Chun, rabbit sunflower. 【Jade articles】Like sunflowers but small leaves, strong like quinoa with hairy. It's smooth and fragrant.
